item.title: [PI] Help Adding Restrictions On D claws?
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

Yes this code is for 508 + but at least u get the concept

look in ur client.java for a “string[] spawn” or add one before your ::pickup command.

String[] spawnDisabled1 = {"Statius", "Vesta", "Morrigan", "Zuriel", "Corrupt", "Void", "spirit shield", "Elite", "Dagon'hai", "Bonesack", "promethium", "blade", "hilt", "Hilt", "Blade", "visage", "Visage", "diamond", "Diamond", "mizzy", "Mizzy", "godsword", "Godsword", "Armadyl", "armadyl", "bandos", "Bandos", "Partyhat", "partyhat", "Age", "age", "hammer", "note", "sigil"}; for (String s : spawnDisabled1) { if (itemName.contains(s)) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "This item cannot be spawned."); return; } }

Read full topic
